duration_raw: until the end of your next turn
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Diviner's Sight](/Spells.aspx?ID=525)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 406 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 willing living creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the end of your next turn
</row>

</column>

---

You glimpse into the target's future. Roll a d20; when the target attempts a non-[secret](/Traits.aspx?ID=142) saving throw or skill check, it can use the number you rolled instead of rolling, and the spell ends. Alternatively, you can instead reveal the result of the die roll for one of the target's secret checks during the duration, and the spell ends. Casting it again ends any active _diviner's sight_ you have cast, as well as any active _diviner's sight_ on the target.
name: Diviner's Sight

summary: You glimpse into the target’s future.
summary_markdown: You glimpse into the target’s future.
text: Diviner's Sight Single Action Source Core Rulebook pg. 406 4.0 Cast verbal Range 30 feet Target 1 willing living creature Duration until the end of your next turn --- You glimpse into the target's future. Roll a d20; when the target attempts a non-secret saving throw or skill check, it can use the number you rolled instead of rolling, and the spell ends. Alternatively, you can instead reveal the result of the die roll for one of the target's secret checks during the duration, and the spell ends. Casting it again ends any active diviner's sight you have cast, as well as any active diviner's sight on the target.
